p: The PCA analysis of the EO chemical compositions showed the difference between the EOs of T. polium and T. decussatus ( Figure 1). Moreover, both samples of the extracted EOs (HD and MAE) are closely correlated for both plant species. Regarding the variables (compounds), T. polium EOs showed a correlation with α-pinene, β-pinene, t-muurolol, α-muurolene, germacrene-D, delta-cadinene, and 6-epi-shyobunol. However, the EOs of T. decussatus revealed a correlation with carvacrol and p-cymene.
